markdownRemark.html:
Today is the exact Birthday Date of my Blog!

If you go to my very first post, my â€˜Hello World - My First Postâ€™ post - youâ€™ll see the date is the 12th of December 2017 ğŸ˜„

(You may have also noticed I silently added some nice filter functionality to the site - I figured mostly devs are probably visiting my site, and donâ€™t want to always see my life and random rants / ideas mixed in.) So to see that â€˜Hello Worldâ€™ post, youâ€™ll need to click either the â€˜allâ€™ or â€˜blogâ€™ tag, and scroll all the way down.

Anyway, as a celebration, I built out a stats page for the blog, found at https://chrisfrew.in/stats. (There will also now be a permanent blog ) This will be a data dump of blog posts per year, both from Gatsby GraphQL queries, and a postgresql database (which keeps track of all those nice â­starsâ­ youâ€™ve all been giving me!). For now, this page will just have blog posts per month, stars per post, and similar. Weâ€™ll see if I can get more creative ideas with it in the future.

Thats all for now!
